sentence: Oh, I remember clearly—I first saw Labubu on social media, scrolling through Instagram.
original: Oh, I remember clearly—I first saw Labubu on social media, scrolling through Instagram.
translation: 哦，我记得很清楚——我第一次是在社交媒体上，在刷Instagram时看到Labubu的。
phonetic: [oʊ, aɪ rɪˈmɛmbər ˈklɪrli— aɪ fɜrst sɔː ləˈbuːbuː ɑn ˈsoʊʃəl ˈmiːdiə, ˈskroʊlɪŋ θru ˈɪnstəˌɡræm.]

sentence: I was just casually browsing my feed at home during my free time.
original: I was just casually browsing my feed at home during my free time.
translation: 我当时正闲暇地在家里刷着我的动态。
phonetic: [aɪ wəz dʒʌst ˈkæʒuəli ˈbraʊzɪŋ maɪ fiːd ət hoʊm ˈdʊərɪŋ maɪ friː taɪm.]

sentence: It was very relaxing, and Labubu appeared suddenly, making a strong impression on me.
original: It was very relaxing, and Labubu appeared suddenly, making a strong impression on me.
translation: 当时感觉非常放松，然后Labubu突然出现，给我留下了深刻印象。
phonetic: [ɪt wəz ˈvɛri rɪˈlæksɪŋ, ənd ləˈbuːbuː əˈpɪərd ˈsʌdənli, ˈmeɪkɪŋ ə strɔːŋ ɪmˈprɛʃən ɑn miː.]

sentence: Sure! It was a bright red Labubu figure, in a playful and dynamic pose.
original: Sure! It was a bright red Labubu figure, in a playful and dynamic pose.
translation: 当然！它是一个亮红色的Labubu手办，摆着一个俏皮而动感的姿势。
phonetic: [ʃʊər! ɪt wəz ə braɪt rɛd ləˈbuːbuː ˈfɪɡjər, ɪn ə ˈpleɪfəl ənd daɪˈnæmɪk poʊz.]

sentence: Got it, the red color and the pose caught your eye and seemed very special.
original: Got it, the red color and the pose caught your eye and seemed very special.
translation: 明白了，那个红色和姿势吸引了你，感觉很特别。
phonetic: [ɡɑt ɪt, ðə rɛd ˈkʌlər ənd ðə poʊz kɔːt jər aɪ ənd siːmd ˈvɛri ˈspɛʃəl.]

sentence: The first thing that came to my mind was, 'Wow, this is really cute and beautiful!'
original: The first thing that came to my mind was, 'Wow, this is really cute and beautiful!'
translation: 我脑海中第一时间想到的是，‘哇，这个真的很可爱又漂亮！’
phonetic: [ðə fɜrst θɪŋ ðæt keɪm tə maɪ maɪnd wəz, waʊ, ðɪs ɪz ˈrɪəli kjuːt ənd ˈbjuːtəfəl!]

sentence: I was genuinely fascinated by its appearance.
original: I was genuinely fascinated by its appearance.
translation: 我真的被它的外形深深吸引了。
phonetic: [aɪ wəz ˈdʒɛnjuɪnli ˈfæsɪneɪtɪd baɪ ɪts əˈpɪərəns.]

sentence: Yes, definitely! It intrigued me so much, I immediately started searching online to learn more about it.
original: Yes, definitely! It intrigued me so much, I immediately started searching online to learn more about it.
translation: 是的，当然！它太吸引我了，我立刻开始在网上搜索了解更多信息。
phonetic: [jɛs, ˈdɛfɪnətli! ɪt ɪnˈtriːɡd mi soʊ mʌtʃ, aɪ ɪˈmiːdiətli ˈstɑːrtɪd ˈsɜːrtʃɪŋ ˈɑːnˌlaɪn tə lɜːrn mɔːr əˈbaʊt ɪt.]

sentence: Its unique style really grabbed my interest. I wanted to see what other designs there were and who created them.
original: Its unique style really grabbed my interest. I wanted to see what other designs there were and who created them.
translation: 它独特的风格真的引起了我的兴趣。我想看看还有哪些其他设计，以及它们是谁创作的。
phonetic: [ɪts juːˈniːk staɪl ˈrɪəli ɡræbd maɪ ˈɪntrəst. aɪ ˈwɑːntɪd tə siː wɑːt ˈʌðər dɪˈzaɪnz ðɛər wɜːr ənd huː kriˈeɪtɪd ðɛm.]

sentence: Just that it was an unexpectedly delightful moment—I never thought I'd become interested in collectible toys, but Labubu changed my mind!
original: Just that it was an unexpectedly delightful moment—I never thought I'd become interested in collectible toys, but Labubu changed my mind!
translation: 只是那是个意外愉快的时刻——我从没想过我会对收藏玩具感兴趣，但Labubu改变了我的想法！
phonetic: [dʒʌst ðæt ɪt wəz ən ˌʌnɪkˈspɛktɪdli dɪˈlaɪtfəl ˈmoʊmənt—aɪ ˈnɛvər θɔːt aɪd bɪˈkʌm ˈɪntrəstɪd ɪn kəˈlɛktəbəl tɔɪz, bət ləˈbuːbuː tʃeɪndʒd maɪ maɪnd!]

sentence: I bought a limited-edition one from the Eleonora series. It’s beautifully detailed and has a unique artistic style that really stands out.
original: I bought a limited-edition one from the Eleonora series. It’s beautifully detailed and has a unique artistic style that really stands out.
translation: 我买了一个来自Eleonora系列的限量版，它的细节很精美，有着非常独特的艺术风格，非常抢眼。
phonetic: [aɪ bɔːt ə ˈlɪmɪtɪd ɪˈdɪʃən wʌn frəm ði eleɪəˈnɔːrə ˈsɪəriːz. ɪts ˈbjuːtəfəli ˈdiːteɪld ənd hæz ə juːˈniːk ɑːrˈtɪstɪk staɪl ðæt ˈrɪəli stændz aʊt.]

sentence: Its design felt more sophisticated and artistic compared to the standard versions. It immediately drew my attention with its refined details.
original: Its design felt more sophisticated and artistic compared to the standard versions. It immediately drew my attention with its refined details.
translation: 它的设计比普通版本更精致、更有艺术感，它精细的细节立刻吸引了我的注意力。
phonetic: [ɪts dɪˈzaɪn fɛlt mɔːr səˈfɪstɪˌkeɪtɪd ənd ɑːrˈtɪstɪk kəmˈpɛərd tə ðə ˈstændərd ˈvɜːrʒənz. ɪt ɪˈmiːdiətli druː maɪ əˈtɛnʃən wɪð ɪts rɪˈfaɪnd ˈdiːteɪlz.]

sentence: Oh, I was incredibly excited! Opening it felt like unwrapping a special gift—it was a thrilling experience.
original: Oh, I was incredibly excited! Opening it felt like unwrapping a special gift—it was a thrilling experience.
translation: 哦，我非常兴奋！打开它的感觉就像拆开一个特别的礼物——那是种很激动人心的体验。
phonetic: [oʊ, aɪ wəz ɪnˈkrɛdəbli ɪkˈsaɪtɪd! ˈoʊpənɪŋ ɪt fɛlt laɪk ʌnˈræpɪŋ ə ˈspɛʃəl ɡɪft—ɪt wəz ə ˈθrɪlɪŋ ɪkˈspɪəriəns.]

sentence: I placed it prominently in my living room.
original: I placed it prominently in my living room.
translation: 我把它放在客厅的显眼位置。
phonetic: [aɪ pleɪst ɪt ˈprɑːmɪnəntli ɪn maɪ ˈlɪvɪŋ ruːm.]

sentence: Because the living room is spacious, and I often host friends there, so everyone can appreciate it.
original: Because the living room is spacious, and I often host friends there, so everyone can appreciate it.
translation: 因为客厅空间宽敞，我经常在那里招待朋友，这样大家都可以欣赏它。
phonetic: [bɪˈkɔːz ðə ˈlɪvɪŋ ruːm ɪz ˈspeɪʃəs, ənd aɪ ˈɔːfən hoʊst frɛndz ðɛər, soʊ ˈɛvrɪwʌn kæn əˈpriːʃieɪt ɪt.]

sentence: Almost every day! It’s in a very visible spot, and I always glance at it when relaxing or when friends come over.
original: Almost every day! It’s in a very visible spot, and I always glance at it when relaxing or when friends come over.
translation: 几乎每天都会！它放在很显眼的位置，我放松时或朋友来的时候总会看它几眼。
phonetic: [ˈɔːlmoʊst ˈɛvri deɪ! ɪts ɪn ə ˈvɛri ˈvɪzəbəl spɑːt, ənd aɪ ˈɔːlweɪz ɡlæns æt ɪt wɛn rɪˈlæksɪŋ ɔːr wɛn frɛndz kʌm ˈoʊvər.]
